title: Cyclonic Storm Model Definitions
description: A set of schema definitions for the cyclonic storms.

trackpoint.description: A Point in GeoJSON with named properties.

point.description: The Point object for the track.

time.description: The time of the observation in storm time units.

vf.description: The forward velocity of the storm in storm velocity units.

minp.description: The barometric pressure at the track point in storm pressure units.

wmax.description: The maximum wind speed at the track point in storm velocity units.

rmax.description: The radial distance of the maximum winds from the track point in storm velocity units.

thetamax.description: The azimuthal angle of the maximum winds relative to the track point in degrees.

overland.description: True if the track point is over land.

windprofile.description: A profile model object representing the wind speed.

pressureprofile.description: A profile model object representing the pressure field.
